Subjects: sermons, verse in; Christ, Passion of
_description: A note on the Passion of Christ, as a gloss on a Latin sermon on the subject — one couplet

CULIi38.Transcription: By a blody weyecrist wente in to his contreye
CULIi38.Note:
Written in margin beside Latin sermon, ‘De passione
                    cristi’.
CULIi38.Editions:
Stemmler,  Theo. 
             “More English Texts from MS. Cambridge University Library
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Anglia
         93 (1975): 1-16: 7.
